Ryazani news

For residents The Ryazan region will live with Dedom Moros

25.12.2023 19:23
It'll be Thursday, 28 December, at 3:00.

Changes have occurred in the structure of the Ryazani administration

25.12.2023 19:14
The mayor of Vitaly Artemis wrote about this on his home page in Connect.

In Michurin Square in Ryazani, a tree fell on a student.

25.12.2023 18:20
The incident happened on Sunday night, December 24th.

Pavel Malkov: " We must ensure a calm, comfortable weekend rest "

25.12.2023 17:44
Malkov stressed that security and the rule of law in the Ryazan region remained the main issues.

In the razor borques, the unknown poisons domestic dogs.

25.12.2023 17:33
One of the local residents was poisoned in the courtyard and two dogs died.

Desda Morose's train will arrive in Ryazan on 26 December

25.12.2023 17:05
Young people and guests of the regional centre, as well as their parents, will be able to meet the chief winter wizard at the Razan-2 station.

The President of Kasimov will be forgiven on 26 December

25.12.2023 16:23
To bury Balashov in Podmoskovier.

In Ryazani, there are several options for rebuilding the Pavlova street

25.12.2023 15:51
Draft changes will be presented for public discussion.

A new building will be built in the Pittorian region. Culture

25.12.2023 15:43
In addition, a sports site will be built in the village, and several plumbing sites will be held.

Pavel Malkov has been instructed to respond to each live broadcast.

25.12.2023 15:38
Malkov instructed the Ministers to expeditiously address each issue and provide options for its resolution.

Two little girls were injured in the Sobor accident in Ryazani

25.12.2023 15:32
Eight-month and six-year-old girls were taken to CSTO.

The Ryazan region has become the leader of Russia to reduce mortality among the working-age population

25.12.2023 15:19
In 2023, the region adopted the seventh line among all Russia ' s entities in the implementation of the " Demography " project.

Andrei Balashov, President of the Kasimov pride,

25.12.2023 14:52
Andrey Balashov was 58 years old.

Maksim Lukjanov died in the air

25.12.2023 14:34
The death of the brother was reported to the Sasso online user of the social media in Connectact.

Mayor Ryazani Artemov gave the teenager a synthesator.

25.12.2023 14:26
The Chief of Administration, Ryazani Vitaly Artemov, gave a synthesizer to a teenager who had left a wish at the Elka.

Housing for the resettlement of citizens is under construction in 12 districts of Ryazan province

25.12.2023 14:20
Dmitri Wasilevsky, Minister of the Construction Complex, described the indicators achieved in this regard.

" Lunch: From the teacher to the museum " : 7info represents a film from a large school museum project

25.12.2023 14:18
It's not just a dry documentary. It's just a few personal stories that were surprisingly merged into a single name.

A laboratory for the prevention and treatment of bees diseases has been established in Ryazan province

25.12.2023 14:12
Modern equipment is purchased thanks to the Nazi project.

The Ryazan region will receive 54.6 million roubles per road by the end of the year

25.12.2023 14:10
Grants are provided for the construction of access routes to meaningful agricultural sites.

In the Ryazan region, the contribution to the cauremont continued

25.12.2023 13:49
In 1 square metre of dwellings, the Tanzanians pay 11 rubles 65 copies.

Blade burned in the Oldozil region

25.12.2023 13:42
The Omshanic in the village of Bogdanovo burned in 05.18 on 24 December. To the nearest fire department of 27 kilometres.

The mass accident occurred in the centre of Ryazani

25.12.2023 13:02
According to the source, there were three light vehicles on the Soborna street. An ambulance was spotted.

In the Ryazan region, 78% of the previously disconnected users returned electricity

25.12.2023 12:59
A total of 105 brigades and 151 units of equipment are in operation. In addition, 21 brigades from other regions were engaged.

In Ryazani, parents evaluated the quality of the renovation work in the gymnasium No. 2 building.

25.12.2023 12:50
A representative of the FGP contract organization " Central science and rebuilding project workshops " revealed the near completion of the part of the building and responded to questions of interest.

In Ryazani, the effects of the snow continue to be eliminated: data as at 25 December

25.12.2023 12:15
At night, 70 fallen trees were sprayed across the city. All tree falls on the trolleybus contact network and cuts are eliminated

The First Movement ' s activists participate in the activities of the Russian Children ' s Dead Moroz

25.12.2023 12:12
As part of the action, schoolchildren and students congratulate the New Year for all who will be in their jobs during the coming holidays.

The accident occurred in the centre of Ryazani on 25 December

25.12.2023 10:27
On the intersection of Lenin and Liberty streets, light vehicles were pushed.

Twenty-one energy brigades from other regions have been involved in remediation work in the Ryazan region

25.12.2023 10:07
In the region, there are currently 386 personnel, comprising 105 brigades with 151 special equipment units.

Ryazan and Kursk Chambers carried out a joint project

25.12.2023 09:22
Sergei Proscurin, head of the razana team, reported on a joint project of two chambers.

Governor Malkov visited Ryazani sports institutions

25.12.2023 08:57
The heads of the region reported on the visits to social media.
